question: 48 regular periods, PMS has changed and now I get a different glum mood that comes with a groggy depression like a heavy cloud, ie. physical feeling too, not just mental. Depression clears up a few days after end of period, but I'm out of commission a good week or two.Also light headed, dizzy feeling.  Certain foods (ie. wheat or sugar) trigger the feelings to be worse.My doctor says perimenopausal depression is just something to live with.Also, I hate feeling like **** physcially.  For instance, go out for lunch with friends, after lunch the food makes me feel dizzy....
title: Hormones? Diabetes? Other
